languages.text: Очередное служение в корабельной часовне было нарушено самым святотатственным образом. Образы мучеников и святых, запечатленные на алтарных иконах, пришли в движение и начали сходить с холстов! Прихожан обуял ужас, и десятки людей погибли в давке и толчее. Наваждение исчезло само по себе... забрав с собой нескольких священников и служек. Говорят, в часы молебнов их исступленные крики все еще слышны под сводами часовни...

A scheduled service in the ship's chapel was interrupted in the most profane manner. The images of saints and martyrs depicted on the altarpiece started to move and stepped down from the canvas! The congregation was filled with terror and dozens perished in the stampede. The illusion disappeared on its own, but it claimed several priests and altar attendants. It is said their frenzied shrieks can still be heard echoing under the vaults of the chapel during prayer...
languages.original_text: Очередное служение в корабельной часовне было нарушено самым святотатственным образом. Образы мучеников и святых, запечатленные на алтарных иконах, пришли в движение и начали сходить с холстов! Прихожан обуял ужас, и десятки людей погибли в давке и толчее. Наваждение исчезло само по себе... забрав с собой нескольких священников и служек. Говорят, в часы молебнов их исступленные крики все еще слышны под сводами часовни...

traits.locale_text: A scheduled service in the ship's chapel was interrupted in the most profane manner. The images of saints and martyrs depicted on the altar icons started to move and stepped down from the canvas! The congregation was filled with terror and dozens of people perished in the stampede. The illusion disappeared on its own... But took several priests and altar attendants. They say their frenzied shrieks can still be heard echoing under the vaults of the chapel during the prayer...

A scheduled service in the ship's chapel was interrupted in the most profane manner. The images of saints and martyrs depicted on the altar icons started to move and stepped down from the canvas! The congregation was filled with terror and dozens of people perished in the stampede. The illusion disappeared on its own... But took several priests and altar attendants. They say their frenzied shrieks can still be heard echoing under the vaults of the chapel during the prayer...

The congregation was filled with terror and dozens perished in the stampede. The illusion disappeared on its own, but it claimed several priests and altar attendants. It is said their frenzied shrieks can still be heard echoing under the vaults of the chapel during prayer...

The congregation was filled with terror and dozens perished in the stampede. The illusion disappeared on its own, but it claimed several priests and altar attendants. It is said their frenzied shrieks can still be heard echoing under the vaults of the chapel during prayer...

A scheduled service in the ship's chapel was interrupted in the most profane manner. The images of saints and martyrs depicted on the altarpiece started to move and stepped down from the canvas! The congregation was filled with terror and dozens perished in the stampede. The illusion disappeared on its own, but it claimed several priests and altar attendants. It is said their frenzied shrieks can still be heard echoing under the vaults of the chapel during prayer...

languages.text: 船上小教堂预定的礼拜仪式被极其亵渎神明的方式打断了。描绘在祭坛上的圣人与殉道者的画像动了起来，随后从画布上跳了下来！教堂里陷入了一片恐慌，数十人在踩踏事件中丧生。在那之后，幻觉自行消散了，但仍有几位牧师与祭坛侍从不幸丧生。据说即便是现在，在教堂的拱顶下祈祷时，仍然可以听到他们疯狂的尖叫声……
languages.original_text: A scheduled service in the ship's chapel was interrupted in the most profane manner. The images of saints and martyrs depicted on the altarpiece started to move and stepped down from the canvas! The congregation was filled with terror and dozens perished in the stampede. The illusion disappeared on its own, but it claimed several priests and altar attendants. It is said their frenzied shrieks can still be heard echoing under the vaults of the chapel during prayer...

traits.locale_text: 船上小教堂预定的礼拜仪式被极其亵渎神明的方式打断了。描绘在祭坛上的圣人与殉道者的画像动了起来，随后从画布上跳了下来！教堂里陷入了一片恐慌，数十人在踩踏事件中丧生。在那之后，幻觉自行消散了，但仍有几位牧师与祭坛侍从不幸丧生。据说即便是现在，在教堂的拱顶下祈祷时，仍然可以听到他们疯狂的尖叫声……

languages.text: Una misa programada en la capilla de la nave fue interrumpida de la manera más profana. Las imágenes de santos y mártires representadas en el retablo empezaron a moverse y bajaron del lienzo. La congregación se llenó de terror y decenas de personas fallecieron en la estampida. La ilusión desapareció por sí sola, pero se cobró la vida de varios sacerdotes y acompañantes. Se dice que aún se oyen sus gritos frenéticos bajo las bóvedas de la capilla durante la oración...
languages.original_text: A scheduled service in the ship's chapel was interrupted in the most profane manner. The images of saints and martyrs depicted on the altarpiece started to move and stepped down from the canvas! The congregation was filled with terror and dozens perished in the stampede. The illusion disappeared on its own, but it claimed several priests and altar attendants. It is said their frenzied shrieks can still be heard echoing under the vaults of the chapel during prayer...

traits.locale_text: Una misa programada en la capilla de la nave fue interrumpida de la manera más profana. Las imágenes de santos y mártires representadas en el retablo empezaron a moverse y bajaron del lienzo. La congregación se llenó de terror y decenas de personas fallecieron en la estampida. La ilusión desapareció por sí sola, pero se cobró la vida de varios sacerdotes y acompañantes. Se dice que aún se oyen sus gritos frenéticos bajo las bóvedas de la capilla durante la oración...

languages.text: 船の礼拝堂の定期礼拝は、神に背く最悪の方法で中断された。祭壇画に描かれた聖人や殉教者の絵が動き始めて、キャンバスから抜け出すではないか！集まった人々は恐怖に慄き、人の波で何十人も命を落とした。幻影は自然に消えていったが、それは数人の司祭と祭壇の従者を連れ去ってしまう。彼らのけたたましい悲鳴が、祈りの間、礼拝堂の金庫の下から今でもこだまして聞こえるとか…
languages.original_text: A scheduled service in the ship's chapel was interrupted in the most profane manner. The images of saints and martyrs depicted on the altarpiece started to move and stepped down from the canvas! The congregation was filled with terror and dozens perished in the stampede. The illusion disappeared on its own, but it claimed several priests and altar attendants. It is said their frenzied shrieks can still be heard echoing under the vaults of the chapel during prayer...

traits.locale_text: 船の礼拝堂の定期礼拝は、神に背く最悪の方法で中断された。祭壇画に描かれた聖人や殉教者の絵が動き始めて、キャンバスから抜け出すではないか！集まった人々は恐怖に慄き、人の波で何十人も命を落とした。幻影は自然に消えていったが、それは数人の司祭と祭壇の従者を連れ去ってしまう。彼らのけたたましい悲鳴が、祈りの間、礼拝堂の金庫の下から今でもこだまして聞こえるとか…

languages.text: Un office prévu dans la chapelle du vaisseau subit une interruption des plus profanes : les représentations des saints et martyrs sur l'autel commencent à bouger et sortent de leur toile ! Terrorisés, les membres de la congrégation s'enfuient, et des dizaines d'entre eux périssent dans la bousculade. L'illusion disparaît d'elle-même, emportant avec elle plusieurs prêtres et servants d'autel. On dit que leurs hurlements frénétiques résonnent encore dans la chapelle lors des prières...
languages.original_text: A scheduled service in the ship's chapel was interrupted in the most profane manner. The images of saints and martyrs depicted on the altarpiece started to move and stepped down from the canvas! The congregation was filled with terror and dozens perished in the stampede. The illusion disappeared on its own, but it claimed several priests and altar attendants. It is said their frenzied shrieks can still be heard echoing under the vaults of the chapel during prayer...

languages.text: Ein angesetzter Gottesdienst in der Kapelle des Schiffs wurde auf höchst profane Art und Weise unterbrochen. Die Bilder von Heiligen und Märtyrern auf dem Altarbild begannen, sich zu bewegen, und traten aus der Leinwand! Angst machte sich in der Gemeinde breit, es brach Panik aus und Dutzende wurden totgetrampelt. Die Illusion verschwand von allein wieder, kostete jedoch mehrere Priester und Altardiener das Leben. Es heißt, dass man beim stillen Gebet noch immer ihre panischen Schreie unter dem Gewölbe der Kapelle widerhallen hört.

languages.text: Geminin şapelindeki planlı bir ayin, kutsallığa tamamen aykırı bir şekilde kesintiye uğradı. Sunaktaki aziz ve şehit tasvirleri, hareket etmeye başlayıp tuvalden indi! Korku içinde kalan cemaatten onlarca kişi, izdihamda hayatını kaybetti. Yanılsama bir süre sonra kendiliğinden sona ererken birkaç rahip ve sunak görevlisi, bu olayda yaşamını yitirdi. Söylenenlere göre ölenlerin çılgınca çığlıkları, şapelde dua edildiği sırada yankılanmayı sürdürüyormuş...
languages.original_text: A scheduled service in the ship's chapel was interrupted in the most profane manner. The images of saints and martyrs depicted on the altarpiece started to move and stepped down from the canvas! The congregation was filled with terror and dozens perished in the stampede. The illusion disappeared on its own, but it claimed several priests and altar attendants. It is said their frenzied shrieks can still be heard echoing under the vaults of the chapel during prayer...
